no_access: You have no access to the bot. Your id is {user_id}. Contact the administrator.
lang_not_supported: Language with code {code} is not supported.
help_no_info: No help information available for this plugin.
adduser_ask_id: Enter the id of the user to add:
adduser_id_not_digit: The new user id must be a number. Try again.
deluser_ask_id: Enter the id of the user to remove:
deluser_id_not_digit: User id must be a number. Try again.
deluser_success: Access for user with ID: {user_id} has been revoked.
deluser_admin_forbidden: Removing a user with admin rights is forbidden.
